author: Scott
text: Could two followers please copy and re-post this tweet? I'm trying to demonstrate that someone is always there, especially at this time of year. Call 0800 689 5652 (National Suicide Prevention Helpline UK). Just two. Any two. Copy, not retweet. Let’s all look out for each other.

Just dropped a great ghost game pun that I'm too proud of even though it's only 4/10....

"Does anybody know where I put the EMF?"

Me:
"E M F raid I do not..."

author: Scott
text:
Posted a personal note in the wrong channel in a Discord, fell asleep and didn't notice it until I woke up.

I don't think it was seen, but I cant be sure! It was kinda a personal silly to myself thing so feels like I accidentally posted a nude or something and I feel sick. https://t.co/kNltSeBF5Q

author: Scott
text:
Since the Energy Price Cap increase is today, we can just consider it a long built up april fools joke and pay what we normally pay.

Because we all know it's a joke.

author: Scott
text: Listening to audiobooks at night is a scam. I've never not fell asleep to them.

author: Scott
text: Does accidentally splashing water on yourself at the sink make you irrationally angry too?

author: Scott
text:
The same with "Toxic gamers" the core problem is toxicity in people. The games industry didn't breed it, and sure, things can be done to address it in games. 

The way people talk about it within the games industry makes it sound like it's all the fault of the games industry.

author: Scott
text:
This will probably be an unpopular opinion but I feel like the people who talk about the issues with the games industry have a blindness to... Humanity?

Because all these issues span across all industries. It's not a games industry exclusive.

author: Scott
text:
Sometimes I like to think of the pointless quality of life improvements we'd commonly have if most of humanity wasn't so into self sabotage.

- Jetpacks
- Laser Tag, but with jetpacks.
- A totally never thought of unique device dogs can use to fly.. I call my idea, the jetpawk.

Then I see it's on my feed because they've already liked it. Every friggin time.

author: Scott
text:
I've had a saying for myself for a few years now.

You're either getting to know someone, or guessing to know someone.

Ask questions, talk with people about things instead of assuming. You grow so much more when you find out how people actually work!

author: Scott
text:
Once you solved all the puzzles you got to a portal at the bottom that would teleport you back to the top. 

Sadly I only got around to the concept and never made a story about people going through it, just the details of the robe wearing long bearded bald taxidermist. 

The end.

author: Scott
text: But the cabin wasn't just a cabin, underneath it was a humongous upside down silo shaped maze. It was full of animal ghosts and he'd sewn (cus taxidermists sow?) Riddles and keys into the animals that had to be solved. 2/?

author: Scott
text:
I've just remembered in junior school we were encouraged to write a story. 

My story was about the ghost of a taxidermist (I didn't know that word at the time) who would lure people into his log cabin in the woods. 1/?

text: If money can't buy you happiness, but the lack of it can cause unhappiness, how do we win!?

author: Scott
text:
Minds borked and keeps overly wandering lately. 

Streams used to help a lot with that. Plus I also kinda miss doing streams in the "organised" entertainment sense, it's been over 3 years since I have but I think I may wanna come back to it soon.

author: Scott
text:
The Christmas movies have begun! Finished Gremlins last night, next is Gremlins two (better than the first) and after that is Krampus. 

What's on your list? https://t.co/Fb41ucpxWq

author: Scott
text:
I did so much exercise today... And by exercise I mean this morning I forced myself out of bed and ran downstairs to pester my housemate to eat a gummy before they went to work. 

Think it's taken it out of me. Knackered.

author: Scott
text:
Some people are so oblivious to a good thing right in front of them that it hurts. 

Me, however, I see it and punt it into space. Team evil ftw baby.

author: Scott
text: Or a party hat and some kinda re-fillable confetti party popper so I can come in and yell, CONGRATULATIONS ON YOUR NEW GIFT OF ONE POUND FROM TROUSERBANDIT!
